AssociateNode.name: AssociateNode
AssociateNode.description: Grants permission to associate a node to a configuration management server

CreateBackup.name: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.description: Grants permission to create a backup for the specified server

CreateServer.name: CreateServer
CreateServer.description: Grants permission to create a new server

DeleteBackup.name: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.description: Grants permission to delete the specified backup and possibly its S3 bucket

DeleteServer.name: DeleteServer
DeleteServer.description:
Grants permission to delete the specified server with its corresponding CloudFormation
                                                stack and possibly the S3 bucket

DescribeAccountAttributes.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
DescribeAccountAttributes.description: Grants permission to describe the service limits for the user's account

DescribeBackups.name: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.description:
Grants permission to describe a single backup, all backups of a specified server or
                                                all backups of the user's account

DescribeEvents.name: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.description: Grants permission to describe all events of the specified server

DescribeNodeAssociationStatus.name: DescribeNodeAssociationStatus
DescribeNodeAssociationStatus.description:
Grants permission to describe the association status for the specified node token
                                                and the specified server

DescribeServers.name: DescribeServers
DescribeServers.description: Grants permission to describe the specified server or all servers of the user's account

DisassociateNode.name: DisassociateNode
DisassociateNode.description: Grants permission to disassociate a specified node from a server

ExportServerEngineAttribute.name: ExportServerEngineAttribute
ExportServerEngineAttribute.description: Grants permission to export an engine attribute from a server

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are applied to the specified server or backup

RestoreServer.name: RestoreServer
RestoreServer.description:
Grants permission to apply a backup to specified server. Possibly swaps out the ec2-instance
                                                if specified

StartMaintenance.name: StartMaintenance
StartMaintenance.description: Grants permission to start the server maintenance immediately

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to apply tags to the specified server or backup

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified server or backup

UpdateServer.name: UpdateServer
UpdateServer.description: Grants permission to update general server settings

UpdateServerEngineAttributes.name: UpdateServerEngineAttributes
UpdateServerEngineAttributes.description:
Grants permission to update server settings specific to the configuration management
                                                type
